description: Variation of condition 1 of listed building consent dated 29 April 2016 (RN: 15/10368/LBC) for 'Substantial demolition and redevelopment behind retained front facades as well as the demolition and reconstruction of mews properties to create two single family dwelling houses. Associated alterations and extensions include subterranean basements, which will extend beneath the mews, part courtyard and the rear sections of the listed buildings; re-instatement of the party wall in the rear courtyard; re-instatement of entrance to no.108; rear lower ground floor extensions partially infilling the rear courtyard and with roof terraces above; construction of full height closet wing extensions; reconstruction of mansard roof extension; installation of mechanical plant; and internal alterations on all floor levels (Site includes nos. 107 - 108 Eaton Square and nos. 107 - 108 Eccleston Mews)'. Namely, to allow minor amendments including a reduction in size of the basement extension (omission of the basement beneath the main house of both properties), alterations to the appearance of the building including retention of parts of the rear elevation and changes to the lower ground floor courtyard fenestration, and internal changes.
